definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是對圖層進行去飽和，圖層將獲得輝光效果。

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是對圖層進行去飽和，圖層將獲得輝光效果。

sentences.english: Set the layer blending mode to Multiply
sentences.chinese: 將圖層混合模式設置爲正片疊底。

sentences.english: Create a new layer above it.
sentences.chinese: 新建一個圖層在它之上。

sentences.english: Add a vector mask by clicking the little icon in the bottom of the layer palette.
sentences.chinese: 點擊圖層區底部的小圖標給該層增加一個蒙版。

sentences.english: Use a big, soft, black brush to paint on the layer mask.
sentences.chinese: 使用大，軟，黑油漆刷上的圖層蒙版。

sentences.english: Clouds were done with a basic airbrush on an additional layer.
sentences.chinese: 在另一個圖層上用基本的噴槍繪製韻。

sentences.english: Layers were and are a lifesaver for any marginally complex design.
sentences.chinese: 圖層是一切較複雜設計工作的救星。

sentences.english: Step 23 Again, duplicate the circle shape. Resize it to 95%. Add following Layer Styles.
sentences.chinese: 再次複製圖層，大小縮爲95%，添加如下圖層樣式。

sentences.english: Step 23 Again, duplicate the circle shape. Resize it to 95%. Add following Layer Styles.
sentences.chinese: 再次複製圖層，大小縮爲95%，添加如下圖層樣式。

sentences.english: Consider drawing polygons tracing the edge of certain layers with heights equal to the cloud tops.
sentences.chinese: 考慮繪製跟蹤高度等於雲頂的特定圖層邊緣的多邊形。

sentences.english: Next thing we want is having the shadow on a different layer.
sentences.chinese: 下一步，我們希望在一個不同的圖層中提取影子。

sentences.english: Now i will add some text on out layout.
sentences.chinese: 我在我們的圖層中添加了一些文字。

sentences.english: Then, select the non-edited layer and with the same brush paint over its Layer mask.
sentences.chinese: 然後，選擇非編輯層，以同樣的刷油漆其圖層蒙版。

sentences.english: If necessary, the opacities of these ground layers can be lowered just a touch.
sentences.chinese: 如有必要，這些地面圖層的不透明度可以降低一點。

sentences.english: Right-click on the layer and click Rasterize Type.
sentences.chinese: 右鍵圖層然後點擊柵格化文字。

definition: to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
